summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate and resolve the issues causing this failure to ensure a smooth user experience.
insights: The Time to First Byte (TTFB) metric is within an acceptable range for all pages, indicating that the server response time is adequate.
The blog page has the lowest load time (269.5 ms) among all pages, suggesting that it is well-optimized. Analyze its structure and apply similar optimizations to other pages.

The pricing page has a slightly higher TTFB (87.69 ms) than the other pages, which might be due to more complex server-side processing. Consider optimizing the server-side code or using a Content Delivery Network (CDN) to improve TTFB.
